title: No more missions?
body: Its been almost a week since I completed my first 3 missions and still havent received any more is that a bug?

replies.body: Not a bug, week 2 hasn't started yet.  Week 2 missions might go live around noon on October 2nd, hang tight!
hey riot, maybe google what a "week" is...........................
I wouldn't have bought the pass if I knew I had to wait 12 days between missions. I can't play around Riot's schedule.
Maybe you guys could add week end and start dates onto the news post.. it's very confusing when a week turns into 12 days.
